title: Upgraded pink trinket bug
body: Whenever i place the upgraded ward trinket (pink) it gets place as the battlecast ward. i dont own this ward skin.

replies.body: This is a bug. Go to the [bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
Could you confirm if other players can see it, your model files might be mixed up and a client repair would likely fix this.
